title: Law enforcement agencies; require to adopt policy prohibiting masks except in certain circumstances.
subject: Judiciary, Division B

extras.summary: AN ACT TO STATE LEGISLATIVE FINDINGS; TO REQUIRE LAW ENFORCEMENT AGENCIES OPERATING IN THE STATE TO MAINTAIN AND PUBLICLY POST A WRITTEN POLICY REGARDING THE USE OF FACIAL COVERINGS; TO SET FORTH CERTAIN MINIMUM STANDARDS OF THE POLICY; TO PROVIDE THAT A LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICER SHALL NOT WEAR A FACIAL COVERING THAT CONCEALS OR OBSCURES THEIR FACIAL IDENTITY IN THE PERFORMANCE OF THEIR DUTIES, EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY AUTHORIZED IN THIS SECTION; TO PROVIDE THAT A WILLFUL AND KNOWING VIOLATION OF THIS PROHIBITION IS PUNISHABLE AS AN INFRACTION OR AS A MISDEMEANOR; TO PROVIDE CERTAIN EXCEPTIONS; AND FOR RELATED PURPOSES.
